reviews.text: Great station. Helpful staff. But I was cheated by the parking people APCOA for the second time recently. Had to pay a 'fine' even though I had a valid car park ticket. I hadn't kept the ticket as evidence when a parking charge notice came two weeks later. A useful additional source of income for APCOA - charging people fines randomly and sitting back, as most people dont keep evidence they paid for a ticket. Most of us would assume companies operating rail carparks to be honest. I am giving the station effectively a zero grading as it is the station management that has licenced these cheats to run station parking.
Very nice train station with nice staff working there. It's well kept so what can i ask for from a train station.
The station is clearly well looked after and safe.

Nice new station well decorated poor service.
Daily queuing.

If I'm late for work, it's because of GWR. If I'm late for a train, it's because I'm queuing for a ticket. Be sure to arrive 30 minutes early; the self service are often broken, and the queues are out the doors.
